channel.title: Astronomer of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomer of the day.

item.title: Vita Hludovici
item.description: Vita Hludovici or Vita Hludovici Imperatoris (The Life of Louis or the Life of the Emperor Louis) is an anonymous biography of Louis the Pious, Holy Roman Emperor and King of the Franks from AD 814 to 840.
